entry.title: Bitcoin Knots "Steel Rope" LTS 21.2.knots20210629 released
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots has released version 21.2.knots20210629, which is a Long Term Support (LTS) "Steel Rope" release. The new version includes bug fixes and updated translations but maintains the same feature set as its predecessor from June 29th, 2021. Users are encouraged to report any bugs using the issue tracker on GitHub and to subscribe to receive security and update notifications. The full release notes and change log can be found on the Bitcoin Knots GitHub page.
